column4: Am I the only one who keeps having to deal with my OpenOffice Writer that keeps crashing?
just run word in WINE, tbqh
what kind of ram do you have?
Mine crashes when I try to open the referencing system, and a few other things
I might have found something to consider http://user.services.openoffice.org/en/forum/viewtopic.php?f=16&t=11311
did you enable it? mine was already enabled
nope, didn't help me at all
did you try to run Outlook 2002 under wine?
you never told me your Open Office writer's version did you?
